If you are lucky enough that you were filmed by press or someone noticed you were under arrest and find you by visiting every police station, one by one, otherwise you may become a dead body to be pulled out from the sea.

That’s what Hong Kongers are facing everyday.
That’s what happening in Hong Kong right now.
Hong Kong is a police state now.
